sentences: Sadus is an American thrash metal band from Antioch, California, active from 1984 to 2015, and reunited in 2017.
Sadus is an American thrash metal band from Antioch, California, active from 1984 to 2015, and reunited in 2017.

During their run, Sadus had released five studio albums, one compilation album and four demos, and had only one lineup change, when guitarist Rob Moore left the band in 1993; instead of replacing him, the band continued as a trio.
